data_description.todo_entity: Todo list to add tasks to

veg_room.title: Add Veg Room
veg_room.description: Configure a veg room for tracking multiple plant batches (clones, mothers, etc.).

data_description.room_id: Unique ID like veg, veg1, mothers
data_description.name: Display name for this room
data_description.calendar_entity: Calendar to add batch tasks to
data_description.todo_entity: Todo list to add batch tasks to
